install.description:
Shiraz [ʃiːˈrɒːz] Named after the ancient city of poets, mathematicians, flowers, and wine in south of Persia which dates back to 4000 BCE.

This template is developed for the Anahita® social networking platform and framework and the Anahita® social apps by Anahitapolis.com. It is available to you under the GPL3 license.

This template provides styling for the following social apps:
  1. Topics
  2. Photos
  3. Groups
  4. Connect
  5. Todos
  6. Pages
The Anahita® Shiraz template is developed by extending the Twitter Bootstrap library.
